operations.target_text: Guest Network Access: Visitors to the Company can access guest networks by registering with the office personnel, bypassing the need for a formal access request.
operations.comment: You indicated that you have an office, so guest network access section should be maintained. Having office = visitors need controlled network access for security.
You indicated you use self-hosted GitLab for version control, so source code access controls are needed. Using version control = IP protection needed.

operations.target_text: Password management systems should be user-friendly
operations.replacement: Password management systems, specifically Bitwarden or 1Password, should be user-friendly
operations.comment: You indicated employees use Bitwarden and 1Password for password management, so policy should reference actual systems rather than generic language.

operations.target_text: All requests will be sent by email to <email>
operations.replacement: All requests will be submitted through ClickUp (transitioning to Jira in October 2025)
operations.comment: You indicated using ClickUp (transitioning to Jira) for ticketing. Ticketing system = proper audit trails and tracking of access requests.

You indicated reviews only occur when employees leave. While this is a minimal approach, we recommend quarterly reviews for most companies. Consider implementing regular reviews to better track access changes over time.
You selected 1 week for access termination. While this timeframe works, we recommend 24 business hours for most companies. Longer than 1 week may raise concerns during audits.
You indicated that Marvin Klenk is the owner of this access control policy. This person should be prepared to answer any questions regarding the policy.
You indicated that both CTO and HR Manager are responsible for approving exceptions to this policy. Having multiple approvers provides backup coverage but ensure clear coordination.
You indicated that both CTO and HR Manager handle policy violations. Having the same roles as exception approvers maintains consistency in policy enforcement.
